website_summaries.verdict: Easily the best pillar candle available for aromatherapy, Aroma Naturals candles smell even better than they look.
pros: Pleasing spicy-citrus scent of clove, cinnamon, and orange
cons: Some size and scent combos may be unavailable as they are made in small batches

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candle
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this candle, it’s beautiful, smells amazing not sure why other reviews complained about the over powering of the orange scent 🤔 it is a orange and lemongrass scented candle. Burns nice there are instructions on how to burn an candle so it doesn’t tunnel just read directions. I ordered on subscribe and save and upped it to two a month and added another scent from the same vendor. Relax and enjoy this candle while you stay home, stay safe , stay healthy. We are all in this together.
customer_reviews.author: JanLynn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy it's not too overpowering of a scent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the orange and lemongrass scent and love it! It's a light, slightly sweet, citrusy scent that is not overpowering in the least. I am very happy with my first purchase of this candle brand.
customer_reviews.author: Florida GalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I does smell like tea
customer_reviews.text: This smells exactly as I’d hoped. I love it. I does smell like tea, as other people have commented, but a spicy tea. My mother always drank Constant Comment tea by Bigelow when I was growing up, and this smells exactly like that tea. Spivey and warm, like orange and cloves :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peterson

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars is because the packaging was a little damaged/dirty. I didn't like that it looked like it wasn't handled with care. Other than that the candle smells absolutely amazing and it's super relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Link

customer_reviews.title: Lovely small candle in festive red
customer_reviews.text: This candle looks great paired with a matching one on my dining table! I love the smell, which, to me, is more spicy than orange-y. The color of the candle is a deep, rich ruby red. It isn’t very tall. Don’t expect to get a plate or holder with the candle. It arrived nicely protected and wrapped. I will definitely buy from Aroma Essentials again! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Katherine Baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect candle for the holiday, or if you’re in the spirit of the holiday
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I’ve bought this in person a year ago for Christmas and been looking for it ever since and so great I found it on amazon, I was concerned about the packaging but it came with other items I ordered so I’m not sure but the candle is perfect just as I remembered it and it smells incredible. It’s just crazy to be in the Christmas feels when spring is just getting going lol
customer_reviews.author: Jay Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Peppermint and vanilla smells so amazing its not over powering or harsh its just right ...
customer_reviews.text: Peppermint and vanilla smells so amazing its not over powering or harsh its just right to be noticeable but not overly so. Absolutely love this candle, I am not one to spend so much on a single candle I was very skeptical but it was worth it and I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: carl mallicoat

customer_reviews.title: Holiday candle  disappointment humbug
customer_reviews.text: I wrote this review about 2 months ago- put the candle away for the holidays and it is just a piece of wax that doesn’t burn or smell- please don’t waste your money. Candle doesn’t burn- there are directions to make it more effective but did that and it stil stop biting- have to spill off wax. Now it’s just sitting there not useable. It may smell nice but went out after 10 mins. It’s cheap wax and scent- not worth it even a this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. NT

customer_reviews.title: ***STRONG!!***
customer_reviews.text: Very pepperminty -- very strong scent! If you like a minty Christmas candle, you'll love it. I wouldn't give it as a gift though with so many people weird about scents, it's STRONG, strong. I enjoyed it, but I probably wouldn't buy it again as it burned fairly quickly and went all melty to one side. If it wasn't in a good rimmed dish it may have actually gone onto the furniture. I was burning one of their pine candles right next to it, and that one burned at normal speed and it stayed straight. It's actually a... meh unless you LOVE peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: PinkMango

customer_reviews.title: Clean aroma and burns clean.  Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle. I have allergies so look for candles that don't give off odors that give my sinus issues. This candle burns well and lasts a long time. I'll continue to buy as the price is great on the subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: snorkie

customer_reviews.title: barely a scent
customer_reviews.text: i wanted the smell of christmas in the house and was horribly disappointed. i can barely smell it with my nose on the candle. it does not smell like christmas trees. there is another scent in there that isn't pleasant. it does not fill the room with fragrance. it is a poor excuse for a candle
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have any kind of sensitivity to strong scents.
customer_reviews.text: I have chemical sensitivity, and these candles literally made me ill. I had to re-box them quickly after opening and putting them in candle holders. The scents quickly pervaded my entire house and took forever to get out. I had to remove the candles from inside my house to the garage and leave my windows opened for hours afterward. Maybe for those not sensitive to strong scents (smelled like chemical fragrances), these would be a good choice, but not for people like me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Too Strong
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to give bad review. The scent on this candle was so strong even when unlit. Just having this Patchouli and Frankincense candle in the same room as me made my throat itch and head ache. I couldn't believe it was this candle so I put it away for 2 weeks, but when brought back out symptoms happened again immediately. Didn't last long because I gave to Good Will.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance - This is a winner
customer_reviews.text: Buying a scented candle without having a preview sniff is always a gamble. I'm glad I did. This candle smells so clean! It is strong, but not overwhelming. I can't give a rating on longevity burn since I only lit it for the first time today. It's completely giftable too, arriving in a boutique box, wrapped delicately in a wax paper. I will buy this again and again and maybe for some friends for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle just to see how the fragrance would smell in my bathroom. Was delighted with the smell and loved how the fragrance bloomed into my bedroom and den, just from one candle. However, was disappointed in how fast the candle burned down after only 5 hrs of usage over 3 days. It was almost gone. I had to give the longevity factor a 3 star because it didn't last very long. Otherwise, I can give a 5-star rating for all the other aspects of this candle. Smells good, almost delightful, lingers in a room long after the flame has been distinguished.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Haga

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet fragrance
customer_reviews.text: At first, the smell of this candle was overwhelming. It packs a strong punch for such a medium sized candle. But, after the first time it is lit, the smell isn't overwhelming. I can smell lemon and vanilla and orange. It's a very sweet smell. I would give it 5 stars but it doesn't come with a container.
customer_reviews.author: Aiylan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Trees and Pizza.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd candle from this company. The color is awesome. Smell memories evoked are of a Christmas tree lot and a nearby pizza place. However, the usage instructions baffle me. I have managed to tunnel all 3 candles.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Franklin Christie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Strong scent.
customer_reviews.text: I received a box from Amazon with several items. As soon as I opened the box, I knew the candle was among them. No problem, because it smells wonderful! I could smell it, even wrapped in plastic and in the pretty little box it came in. To be honest, I haven't lit it yet. It has a nice fragrance just sitting there. But it is large enough to last many hours, substantial and pretty enough to give as a gift. (In fact, that was my first thought when I opened it... but no, I'll buy another one for that!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful candle. The shades of orange with the mottled white is a perfect color for the scent. It burns evenly and with a steady flame. The scent is enough to sooth but not so much to annoy. I will never be without at least one of these candles in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Street runner

customer_reviews.title: Candle decimated in a hour!
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of money and probably dangerous. Fragrance is minimal (peppermint) and the burn time is ridiculously short. Lit the candle and went to make some lunch and the candle went from brand new to like two inches left. It burnt so quickly that the wax was all over my coffee table and my carpet. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Once the candle is burning, the scent almost disappears and does not fill the room(s). This is disappointing since my expectations were based on the seller's description. The wrapping and shipping box were much more fragrant than the actual candle.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Yellow one smells SO good.
customer_reviews.text: I have the lemongrass one and the basil one. Lemongrass smells amazing and basil one is a little earthy for me. They are really nice tho, they come wrapped in paper and in a box so you could gift it. They have a metal base to their wick so you can't center it on a pillar candle holder spike. Will buy lemongrass again and would reccomend to anyone who loves bright, citrus type smells.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfDressesAndMesses4

customer_reviews.title: Lovely strong scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle and it makes a nice gift. Unfortunately I had an allergic reaction: itchy burning eyes and runny sinuses. I let it air out for over a week and never lighted it. 🧡Great customer service! 💛. I requested a return and And there was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn

customer_reviews.title: Smells okay but doesn't burn well but could be made better
customer_reviews.text: It has an okay grassy scent and it would have been a little better if it had a little more of woody scent instead of grass paste scent. It does not burn well, it creates a dip in the middle since the sides of the candle don't burn/melt at all.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good But. . .
customer_reviews.text: The candle arrived in a smashed, discovered box. Sadly, when I opened the box, the candle itself had defects in appearance. I was concerned it wouldn't burn correctly. It looked like they poured wax in the mold, then there was something else that appeared as a light area then more candle wax on top. I received a refund for which I'm grateful. Smells great. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MedUSA

customer_reviews.title: Smells like heaven
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so my husband isn't big into smells and candles like I am, but when I opened this even he was like, Wow! I love this candle!! The smell is unique in the best way. I wish there was a perfume of it! Will definately buy again once we've burned through this one!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: Contents arrived WET
customer_reviews.text: I've been subscribing for several years now and have been very satisfied. My shipment today, however, arrived in a completely dry Amazon box, while the contents were soaking wet! A little more care may be needed in your shipping process!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Smells absolutely wonderful when you take the wrapper off even smells great when you blow out the flame but as for burning it to put fragrance in the air doesn't do a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mulvey

customer_reviews.title: More scent and even burning at the top
customer_reviews.text: I wish it gave off more scent and burned a little more evenly at the top- overall satisfied and hope maybe the next purchase will burn a little better
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Losey

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE Aroma Naturals candles
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Aroma Naturals candles! I first bought them some 10 years ago in the market and have been a fan since! The wicks are made of cotton, no aluminum is used! ONE aroma candle scents the room for hours. My favorite are the white pachouli and frankincense, the dark red one that has a cranberry orange scent and dark green winter scent at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these candles! I like to have a candle burning in my room fairly regularly, so I don't want to spend too much money on candle jars. It is just a pillar candle, so I keep it in a little dish and it burns in my window sill. I buy a new candle once every two months or so, and the frankincense and the juniper ones smell great and makes the room smell great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Burden

customer_reviews.title: Best candle
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with researching different products on amazon lol. This candle was part of one of those research nights. It's just uber quality plain and simple. You get what you pay for alot of the time and this is an expensive candle but it's also much better then any other candle I've seen. The scent is so nice my mother wanted to keep the box as an air freshener. You can grab a holder for it as well at the dollar tree if you have one
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Weston

customer_reviews.title: Too sloppy for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Smell is great bc it's strong. However, it was supposed to be a gift for someone box was all white, nothing like the box above it had black scuff marks on it. The label was crooked and it's only like 3 or 4 inches tall. I was shocked it was so tiny and untidy $10. Needless to say, I couldn't give it as the gift I had hoped. I kept it. Win some, Lose some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the smell of the candle. My whole living room smells absolutely amazing. Even though the candle is not burning the orange smell is strong. I love this candle and absolutely will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Headache
customer_reviews.text: Smells very flowery & gives me an instant headache. I use both orange and lemongrass essential oils frequently with no problem; I can only guess that the “orange & lemongrass” blend used in this candle contains other oils or fragrances that aren’t listed. Wish I had returned it before I lit it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Greene

customer_reviews.title: I love this candle.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was too expensive. But Wow. Burns great, smells great. I now love this candle. I will probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Inthe Woods

customer_reviews.title: A lovely candle
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice mellow peppermint scent. Having experienced a few that were all industrial-smelling, I found this. This candle has a beautiful natural smell that does not get cloying the longer the candle burns. Recommended for sensitive noses like mine, or... Anyone at all!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance is so subjective. I bought two of these for a hostess gift, but the scent even in the box was so strong I decided against it. It is kind of a sweet, artificial "forest" scent and even unlit the room gets over-perfumed. I'll use them outside. (they do burn nicely.)
customer_reviews.author: leilani

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to smell nice but not like it did! It smells so GOOD! It does seem to burn a little faster than I would like but I bought a different scent and it burns much slower. I know some say the smell is great but once lit you don't smell it but I haven't experienced that with my candles. My house smells wonderful with these candles!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Duryea

customer_reviews.title: No headaches because there are no synthetics!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Scented candles give me terrible headaches so I never buy them and never go into a room burning them. I saw these were essential oils with no synthetics so I decided to try them. I am headache free and enjoying the peppermint and vanilla! I am now ordering other scents with my new found discovery.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Adams

customer_reviews.title: SEVERE Wax Overflow of Sides
customer_reviews.text: The Positive - the scent is great. BUT DON’T LIGHT IT! After a 30 minute burn wax wax overflowing the sides, not in one small area.
customer_reviews.author: AviSaint

customer_reviews.title: The smell is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift so I don't know how well it held up or burned. What I do know is the scent was amazing! I was seriously tempted to keep it rather than gift it.
customer_reviews.author: mommermom

customer_reviews.title: Long long lasting candle, great scent.
customer_reviews.text: This candle came in a foldable paper box, no container, so it’s burning on one of mine. Scent is good, long long lasting flame, bottom of this candle is uneven, tips over. Overall is a good candle. Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: One of the best candles I’ve had in a long time. I put it in my room and I can smell it all the way down my hallway WITHOUT EVEN LIGHTING IT YET. I highly recommend these candles. Literally stop looking at reviews and put it in your cart already. You won’t be disappointed. They wrapped it in wax paper so even if you don’t have a candle holder you can place it on the wax paper. I’ll definitely be buying more of these candles.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed! The patchouli and Frankensense is the best and I use it every time I do yoga. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Deterling

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Was pleasantly surprised. Does last as long as advertising states.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL CANDLE
customer_reviews.text: For the price this candle is the best. The scent is great and it last a while. I use these candles for meditation and it definitely helps relax me. I can't stress it enough I love love this candle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Totally love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review of anything on Amazon before. I want to let anyone considering candles by this company to buy them immediately! I have three, a green, this red one, and white (sorry I don't remember the scents) that I'm burning over the holidays and I am so very happy that I discovered this company! They have a most delightful scent, are slow burning, and I'm going to order more as soon as I post this review. I can't wait to try other scents! These are now my go-to candles!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wilcock

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Living in a house with a child in diapers and two old stinky dogs this was a must. The scent is powerfully subtle... won't overwhelm a room but covers up orders nicely... and I usually don't like peppermint. Seem to burn forever too
customer_reviews.author: H. Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not sure bout this
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell of cinnamon. I have a 2 bedroom apartment. The only place I can smell this candle is in the small bathroom. I have left it burning in each room for multiple hours
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If you love aromatherapy trust me you will not regret buying this candle.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: best smelling
customer_reviews.text: the best smelling candle i have bought to date. not overpowering and just yummy. i'm glad Amazon lets you see your order history because i will be getting this one again :)
customer_reviews.author: A.B.F. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Aroma?
customer_reviews.text: Where's the Aroma? we can't smell any aroma past 6 inches away from the candle. We got a bad one, very disappointed, after reading so many positive reviews we received a DUD. As for my opinion this company probably makes a good product but like all things it has DUDS too and I see a lot of complaints like mine, so buy Knowing the risk, I don't like complications with my purchases and I take it as a bad sign for future buisiness.
customer_reviews.author: María Mata

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: This peppermint candle has no scent. I’ve burned it twice in a small room and I couldn’t smell it. I usually get my candles from Bath and Body Works and will go back to them. This candle was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: angela brown

customer_reviews.title: I like the candle
customer_reviews.text: I like the candle, the way it looks and feels, not too crazy about the way it smells. I looked everywhere for green pillar candles and there were none but red and white during Christmas, imagine that? I would prefer pine, or fresh scent, but those were not the choices. But at least the size and color is right.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely smell
customer_reviews.text: I have a candle holder that has to have 2.5” candles. I purchased these on a whim. They smell AMAZING. They are not even burning, but my whole foyer smells wonderful. The color of yellow is so happy too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, it fills the room, finally a candle that aromatizes. Burns nice but faster due to lack of jar, best placed in a jar. Satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Iliya Khramov

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The box, is a good quality and its wrapped in a Nice wax/gift paper. The color is beautiful and bright. at first before lighting it I thought it was "to essential oily" just by the smell (with ought lighting it)... then I lit it and let it burn for a while it was prefect, its a good product is your health conscious, caring about what its made out of and what your gonna breathe in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wick too short
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several candles from this manufacturer, but I am very disappointed with the last couple orders. The wicks are too short, so you can't light them. I first just thought I got a bum candle and just threw it away. I order in bulk, so I only noticed this was a reoccurring problem after a couple weeks of actually receiving the candles. So for the price of each candle, I'm really disappointed. I love the smell of them, but I can't burn a candle with no wick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Odor
customer_reviews.text: I loved the packaging sturdy and good nice for gift Beware the outside of the box smelled stronger than anticipated almost too much I almost didn’t open But decided to try anyway and it was a lot better than expected. So I will up my stars The company has awesome customer service one time purchase only for me. But my nose and sense are very sensitive smell better than the package!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect x million. Being allergic to soy, I have to find candles that are beeswax or paraffin AND this company fits that, but most of all they burn slowly and have the best scent I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Ness

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon, orange and clove.......beautiful scent for a room
customer_reviews.text: We have bought so many candles, but this is one of the best. It makes our home have this wonderful, warm scent...reminding us of holiday time. Burns so long as well. Definitely worth the money---have purchased about five times now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: IT HAD A NICE PLEASANT CLEAN SCENT
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent, though was a bit disappointed that it didn't burn as long as other candles of a similar nature have.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Bishop Award-winning author and poet

customer_reviews.title: Low scent. Does not spread scent.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this. It did dissipate scent into the room. I was hoping for a nice citrus smell. But it didn’t happen
customer_reviews.author: fader1

customer_reviews.title: Love this smell!
customer_reviews.text: Its strong but in a good way, not overpowering at all. Smell lasts in the room for a couple hours after being put out. Love it. definitely will purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Orange + Lemongrass = Heaven
customer_reviews.text: The orange and lemongrass scents are incredible. love Love LOVE this candle!
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Scent is overwhelming. Can’t comment on longevity because I had to put it out within 10 minutes of lighting.
customer_reviews.author: lamarp

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Throw is great for a small candle, and the scent is wonderful! The only drawback is how quickly it burns. Glad I decided to give this a try. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bgtrrz

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Still smell even in the plastic wrapper. Waiting to use them for a new Christmas centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: PleasantlyPixie

customer_reviews.title: Way too strong and smells like soap
customer_reviews.text: Woah! I got the patchouli and frankincense scent and it’s just smells so strongly of cheap soap. I had to put it out in the garage it was making me nauseous and now it’s straight in the garbage I couldn’t even open it!
customer_reviews.author: AFab

customer_reviews.title: smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: ugh. really stinky. not a natural scent at all, but very chemical. I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: L. J Rabinashad

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells wonderful however it was used when I received it. :(
customer_reviews.author: mia m. irvine

customer_reviews.title: Smell great.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. I’m fussy about candles and don’t like anything that smells cheap. I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny Happy People

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this candle
customer_reviews.text: The smell is wonderful! This will be a repeat buy. The candle has longevity. I absolutely love this candle.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Aromatic Candle
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a great buy. I can smell it unlit from across the room. Once lighted, the smell fills the room with a delicate aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought, but fragrance was nice and burned very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: lroe

customer_reviews.title: Smell Great
customer_reviews.text: The candles are absolutely Beautiful. like them a lot and the smell is just great
customer_reviews.author: Love Texas

customer_reviews.title: Smells SO good!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Smells amazing. Burns nicely without dripping out. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: HeliFlyer

customer_reviews.title: What a great smell
customer_reviews.text: A great craft clean scent I light the candles all day long The feedback of my visitors is "what a great smell is in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this candle!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a scent, but I actually think it's a pretty cute candle
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Orange Creamsicle
customer_reviews.text: If you like the (very sweet) smell an orange creamsicle you'll enjoy this candle. Was hoping for more of a citrus-y smell and this is not.
customer_reviews.author: Tammeee

customer_reviews.title: To expensive for what you receive
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller then I thought it would be especially for the price of the candle. I wish I would have gone with another company.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great smell.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really good smelling and really strong. Don’t think you even need to light it to make the room smell good.
customer_reviews.author: JeffV

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant! Bit small
customer_reviews.text: Fast service! SOooOo smells wonderful!! Abit small than I expected but Happy
customer_reviews.author: Lauretta Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have never been more disappointed with a product bought off of amazon.... there is absolutely no “scent”... when the box was opened i was so thrilled that the candle smelled heavenly! But the scent was only on the wax paper covering the candle. After lighting the candle there is absolutely no scent... such a shame...
customer_reviews.author: uday k. sangar

customer_reviews.title: Smells Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this candle for years and never disappointed. I burn it in the summer rather than at Christmas because I think the the scent is very cool and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen O.

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: This product I really enjoyed. The candle lasted 2 weeks and I burned it much. Time to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarajo

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing...Just like the smell of Christmas. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the packaging holding the candle is all dirty and scuffed up. I'm giving this as a gift, so it's kind of embarrassing that the package looks trashy. So if you're just buying this for yourself, 5 stars! The candle smells really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Meechum

customer_reviews.title: Just no.
customer_reviews.text: Nooooo. Smells like soap and an awful soap at that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Smell super but burns down in a few days if evening use
customer_reviews.text: Over priced for a candle that burns so quickly and smells great
customer_reviews.author: Mornaluz

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Before I lit the candle I smelled it and it was fine. After burning it awhile the scent got too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Candles smell nice enough but are smaller than I anticipated. Was too small to present as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Ellingsen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t smell great
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty but doesn’t have the best scent. Smells like a creamsicle if that makes sense. Orange creamy scent. Not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Scent isn't as strong as the ones I use to buy at Whole Foods
customer_reviews.text: I still like the product, it just isn't offering the strong aroma that I use to love. I wonder if the candles are sitting in an Amazon warehouse longer and thus have lost some of the stregnth. Also, they don't seem to offer as many options anymore. I use to get several varieties, including a Rose scented pink one, but I don't see those offered.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Candles!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great candle and smells really nice without the chemical smell that some of them give off. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING CANDLE! They smell so beautiful and lend a light fragrance tot he living room. Once the one so have burn out I will be purchasing again in an another scent.
customer_reviews.author: AKFurgison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, I love the fresh scent of oranges from those candles, I bought 2 they aren’t overpowering at all, makes my living room smell delicious. I’ll buy again this company.. Thanks so much:)
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly What I Smelling For 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve know better than to buy a candle online without knowing it’s scent first. Bought the patchouli & frankincense candle. Smells more like a citronella candle. Guess I can burn it outside during the summer & keep the bugs away. 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Mozzy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite candle, EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Divine fragrance ... light and airy scent I thought I would never burn a candle again ... until I visited a friend burning this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Karch

product_meta.title: Aroma Naturals Essential Oil Orange, Clove and Cinnamon Scented Pillar Candle, Peace Pearl, 2.5 inch x 4 inch
product_meta.description: Scent:Orange, Clove & Cinnamon (Pearl)| Size:2.5 X 4 InchSweet uplifting Orange, revitalizing Clove and spicy Cinnamon fill your home with comfort and warmth. Our artisan-style handcrafted candles were founded on the belief that Pure Plant and Flower Aromas enhance our well-being, and are a vital pathway to a healthy lifestyle. Today, we still produce in small batches, with only food-grade waxesm 100 percent Pure Essential Oils and Pure Plant Aromas with natural all-cotton wicks. Aroma Naturals candles burn cleaner and have natural, delicate allergy friendly aromas that are as functional and therapeutic, as they are beautiful.
feature_bullets: Contains 1, white Peace Pearl 2.5x4 Orange, Clove and Cinnamon Naturally Blended pillar candle
Original authentic aromatherapy pure essential oil candles are allergy friendly with no synethetic fragrances, and all-cotton metal-free wicks
Handmade in the USA, in our own factory in Southern California
